name: Catnap (Kevin Max, euqrs, Naomi PK ( KREPEN ), xbdoblex, fallthem000)
name_original: Catnap (Kevin Max, euqrs, Naomi PK ( KREPEN ), xbdoblex, fallthem000)
description:
Help Martha find the way to escape her nightmares in this unreal world dead ends.

Keyboard controls:
Offset -> A, D
Jump -> Space
Speed up sleep -> S
Restart -> R

Challenge: Find all the possible routes to help Martha escape her nightmares and share your achievement with a screenshot in the comments. :D

Credits This game was created for Ludum Dare 47 (October 2020).

Made by:

  • Jose "Developer" (josecahuanat@gmail.com)
  • Kevin "Designer" (kmrincana@gmail.com)
  • Martha "Writer" (marescalante04@gmail.com)
  • Music & SFXs by euqrs (https://m.soundcloud.com/euqrs)
  • Art by: Naomi (https://www.instagram.com/krepen)
